title: Why Snowflake, Salesforce, and MongoDB Stocks All Popped Today
text: Piper Sandler thinks all three of these stocks are buys, but only one really has an attractive valuation.

title: 7 Growth Stocks to Buy Now for Extraordinary Gains
text: It's been the worst year for growth stocks since the great financial crisis of 2008. While 2021 saw big selloffs in weaker companies, 2022 has seen nearly universal selling across the growth stock sector.

title: Is Salesforce Stock a Buy Now?
text: A prolific activist investor has set its sights on the cloud software giant.

title: 5 Reasons I Like Salesforce Stock
text: The current sell-off could be a speed bump on the way to another successful decade ahead.

title: Salesforce (CRM) Rises as Activist Starboard Buys Stake
text: The activist hedge fund Starboard Value buys a significant stake in Salesforce (CRM) as it believes the enterprise software maker is available at a huge valuation discount.
